#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<map>
#define SQRT(x) ((int)sqrt(x)+1)
#define LAST_4_VAL(x) ((x)%10000)
#include<cstdio>

bool flag;
int power_fn(int x,int y){
long long int r = 1;
for(int k=0;k<y;k++){
    r*=x;
    if(r>=10000){
    flag = true;
    r%=10000;
    }
}
return r;
}

int main(){
long int m[500001] = {0};
//std::map<int,int> m;
long int test;
long int a;
for(int i=2;i<=708;i++)
    for(int j=i;j<=500001/i;j++) i==j?m[i*j]+=1:m[i*j]+=2;
scanf("%ld",&test);
while(test--){
    flag = false;
    scanf("%ld",&a);
    long int number_divisor = m[a];
    long int ans;
    ans = (number_divisor%2 ? power_fn((int)sqrt(a),number_divisor):power_fn(a,number_divisor/2));
    flag ? printf("%04ld\n",ans):printf("%ld\n",ans);
}
return 0;}
